website_summaries.verdict: The powerful Monster DNA Pro 2.0 delivers deep bass with enough high frequency presence to keep things balanced, but similar-sounding headphones can be found for less money.
pros: Powerful audio performance with massive bass response
Ships with two detachable cablesâone with an inline remote
cons: Not for anyone seeking a flat-response sound signature

customer_reviews.title: Not built properly
customer_reviews.text: Not that great.. Sounds good enough though.. Build quality is garbage.. I received them with the ear pads ripped where I would assume there was glue to keep each piece together. So I took it upon myself to pretend like I worked for a nice headphone company and re-did the ear pads myself and stitched them. Way better now. Geez. For a $300 priced pair of headphones I would expect for them to be built properly and solid.. See pics.
customer_reviews.author: JVii

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed. Held up well for a few week
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. Held up well for a few week, then just fell apart. Ear pads are unrecognizable. Some blue foam protruding through the seams, plastic folding back. Very unhappy with them
customer_reviews.author: Jesus Diaz Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Poor Make
customer_reviews.text: My son and I have had several pairs of these headphones over the course of 4 years. Both of our recent purchases didn’t work out so well this time. The material that covers the foam over the ears separated from the inside of the ear and the foam is showing
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: I was hoping Monster wouldn't crap out on the pads
customer_reviews.text: The pads starting coming apart on after a few months of sparingly use in the office. I was hoping Monster wouldn't crap out on the pads, but they sure did!
customer_reviews.author: Eddie

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Survived my tween only for six month. Warranty kicked in, but expected a little bi more durability.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Style 8. 5/10, Sound 7. 5/10, ...
customer_reviews.text: Style 8.5/10, Sound 7.5/10, Price 5/10, The leather started to wear off from the stitches.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Careful, these guys will tear to peices.
customer_reviews.text: Other than the fact that the crappy pleather is glued on, and rips way you too easy, these guys sound great. I recommend a pocket amplifier. Probably wouldn't buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Wankershim Reviews

customer_reviews.title: It's suck so bad unless I was sent a defected headset
customer_reviews.text: It's suck so bad unless I was sent a defected headset. Not even just a lil vibration to it. The regular DNA sounds better than this but like I said it could be a defective item that was sent to me .
customer_reviews.author: Delly

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality is decent but there are better headsets on the market for less with better build ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased in December 2015 and worn maybe 4 or 5 times and the cushion for the right ear cup has ripped exposing the foam padding. Sound quality is decent but there are better headsets on the market for less with better build quality.
customer_reviews.author: Justin A Kirthlink

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: I just got my headphones in the mail today i love the sound quality they put off my only issue i had was a tear on both ear pads but that can easily be fixed
customer_reviews.author: Jerry hunter

customer_reviews.title: Noise cancelling isn't quite a good as his beats
customer_reviews.text: Our son loves them. Noise cancelling isn't quite a good as his beats, but the fit is better.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen M. Fetz

customer_reviews.title: The ear cup started falling apart coming unsowed you could ...
customer_reviews.text: The ear cup started falling apart coming unsowed you could see the foam inside of the ear piece coming apart...
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Son really likes headphones he has them on right know
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: These headphones have a nice design but right out of the box my headphones ear cup was ripped
customer_reviews.author: cool guy

customer_reviews.title: awesome sound and great price
customer_reviews.text: dope sound, no need to overpay for beats and no need to charge them
customer_reviews.author: User

customer_reviews.title: Warped tearing after about 2 months
customer_reviews.text: They sound great and everything..but the ear pad is already tearing. I previously had some beats studio 2's and the same thing happened with them. I guess all the monster headphones are cheaply made.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They sound great! Good build quality. Comfortable. Should last me 10 years.
customer_reviews.author: upfreebird

customer_reviews.title: Very cheap quality
customer_reviews.text: cheap metal broke first day, i the pad worst pad I ever see
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Even the sound and characteristics are very good, material quality is poor
customer_reviews.text: Even the sound and characteristics are very good, material quality is poor. After a week the stitches of the ear cover are losen.
customer_reviews.author: Irene Sanabria

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase for le price
customer_reviews.text: Super clear sound and vocals. You will definitely hear all instruments in your song. Not too bass heavy. Not super comfy, but wearable. After about an hour or two I really feel them on my ear. Sound is great for price. Update: ear cup ripped on both sides. Sound is still awesome but looks trashy
customer_reviews.author: Wut

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I got these headphones for work. I work in a "open" work space where there is noise everywhere. These headphones block out most of the noise. They are really good quality and make all of my music sound amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic headphones with brilliant sound quality
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my son who has previously had 2 pairs of Beats that broke. Before having the Beats headphones he had a pair of Monster DNA on ear and wanted to return to Monster. These are over ear headphones, not on ear. But don't dismiss these headphones if you are used to on ear headphones. The sound quality is greater and according to my son better than Beats. He will certainly be sticking to Monster headphones in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria Jean McDonald

customer_reviews.title: Sublime!
customer_reviews.text: Without a doubt the best sound I ever heard from a set of headphones. Absolutely stunning! Very comfortable (I forgot I had them on). Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic performance on these as with the other dna products. I'm very happy with my purchase as they sound incredible but for £200 I would have liked a hard case instead of this pouch to protect them.
customer_reviews.author: lloyd milton

customer_reviews.title: Sounds really good with an bass amp
customer_reviews.text: Sounds really good with an bass amp, it works great for games as it has a good sound staging, BUT the quality is TRASH, I'll leave some photos... they will explain everything after a year of use... i never dropped em and i use them 5 days a week between 4 to 6 hours a day.
customer_reviews.author: Yamil de Leon

customer_reviews.title: Truly Amazing
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are incredibly good. I purchased a pair of Beats Studios despite being told not to and ended up returning them. Monster's DNA Pro 2.0s are true awesome. You can turn these up as loud as you would like and it won't jeopardize your sound quality. I am truly impressed and pleased with my purchase. You will not regret purchasing these, even if you haven't tried them first.
customer_reviews.author: Marko Grgic

customer_reviews.title: The DNA of loud awesomeness
customer_reviews.text: Outstandingly loud, clear and bassy with a kick like a carthorse. Comfortable fit for me, I can fall asleep in them on the train...
customer_reviews.author: Alex Prosser-Snelling
